trans-unit.source: Represents the binding element for the named pipe transport.
trans-unit.target: 表示命名的管道传输的绑定元素。

trans-unit.source: This transport uses URIs of the form "`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`".
trans-unit.target: 此传输使用形式的 Uri"`net.pipe`://`hostname`/`path`"。

trans-unit.source: Other URI components are optional.
trans-unit.target: 其他 URI 组件是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The NamedPipeTransportBindingElement class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the named pipes transport protocol.
trans-unit.target: NamedPipeTransportBindingElement 类是创建实现命名的管道传输协议的自定义绑定的起始点。

trans-unit.source: This transport is used for on-machine [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]-to-[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] communication.
trans-unit.target: 此传输用于计算机上的[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]到[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]通信。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]服务模型使用此类创建实现的工厂对象<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory>和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener>接口。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory>

trans-unit.source: These factory objects then create and accept the channels that transmit SOAP messages using the named pipes protocol.
trans-unit.target: 然后，这些工厂对象创建，并接受使用命名的管道协议传输 SOAP 消息的通道。

trans-unit.source: You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 配置通过设置其属性，如创建此类的工厂︰ <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.ConnectionPoolSettings%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also set properties on the base class, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, such as: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以设置属性的基类， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>，如︰ <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A>， <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A>，和<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.ConnectionBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.TransferMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement.MaxBufferSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 属性的完整列表，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Finally, you can set properties on the base class of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>, which is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 最后，您可以设置属性的基类上<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>，即<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>，如<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement.MaxBufferPoolSize%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: For a complete list of properties, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>.
trans-unit.target: 属性的完整列表，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: This method is a copy constructor used to clone the binding element, and is exposed so that derived classes can implement <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法是用于克隆绑定元素的复制构造函数，并且公开，以便派生的类可以实现<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement.Clone%2A>

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Creates a copy of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: 创建当前绑定元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the current binding element.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前绑定元素的副本。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of connection pool settings.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合的连接池设置。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings"></xref> object that contains various properties related to connection pooling.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeConnectionPoolSettings"> </xref>对象，包含的各种属性与连接池相关。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets the pipe settings for the named pipe transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: 获取命名的管道传输绑定元素的管道设置。

trans-unit.source: The pipe settings for the named pipe transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: 命名的管道传输绑定元素的管道设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI scheme for the transport.
trans-unit.target: 返回传输的 URI 方案。

trans-unit.source: This property is provided to enable binding validation against base addresses.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于启用对基址的绑定验证。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URI scheme for the transport, which is "net.pipe".
trans-unit.target: 返回传输，即"net.pipe"的 URI 方案。
